name: Frost Trickster
oracle_text:
Flying
When Frost Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavor_text: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.

name: Teachings of the Archaics
oracle_text: If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw two cards. Draw three cards instead if an opponent has at least four more cards in hand than you.
flavor_text: Mages seek out the ancient beings known as the Archaics for their boundless knowledge of history and magic, dispensed only in cryptic metaphors.

name: Quandrix Campus
oracle_text:
Quandrix Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see beauty in patterns and equations choose Quandrix, the college of numeromancy.

name: Golden Ratio
oracle_text: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"When I look around, I see a world defined by patterns that still manages to defy them."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

name: Kelpie Guide
oracle_text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent you control.
{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
flavor_text: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.

name: Clever Lumimancer
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Lumimancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You're too dim to realize it, but you've already lost."

name: "A Poet That Knows It"
oracle_text: Whenever "A Poet That Knows It" attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

name: "Sinister Domain"
oracle_text:
You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

name: "Eyebat"
oracle_text:
Flying
When "Eyebat" dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: "Deep Disappointment"
oracle_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.

name: Defend the Campus
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

name: Hall of Oracles
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T} Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

name: Verdant Mastery
oracle_text:
You may pay {3}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Search your library for up to four basic land cards and reveal them. Put one of them onto the battlefield tapped under an opponent's control if the {3}{G} cost was paid. Put two of them onto the battlefield tapped under your control and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: "Geist Commander"
oracle_text: {T}: Attacking Spirits you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: "Approach of the Dragon"
oracle_text:
"Approach of the Dragon" deals 3 damage to each opponent. Then you may exile "Approach of the Dragon" and four other cards named "Approach of the Dragon" from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it into the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named "Approach of the Dragon".

name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
oracle_text:
Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

name: "We'll Do It Live!"
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• "We'll Do It Live!" deals 1 damage to any target.
• Destroy target artifact.

name: "Conspiracy Theorist"
oracle_text:
Whenever "Conspiracy Theorist" attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them. If you do, you may cast that card this turn.

name: "Academic Debate"
oracle_text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have that creature gain reach until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

name: Creative Outburst
oracle_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on he bottom of your library in a random order.
{u/r}{u/r}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

name: Solve the Equation
oracle_text: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Zimone's brilliance drew attention from many, including the sinister mages known as the Oriq.

name: Explosive Welcome
oracle_text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add {R}{R}{R}.
flavor_text: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

name: Make Your Mark
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.

name: Mage Hunter
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
flavor_text: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

card_faces.name: Wandering Archaic
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may pay {2}. If they don't, you may copy that spell. You many choose new targets for the copy.

card_faces.name: Wandering Archaic
card_faces.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may pay {2}. If they don't, you may copy that spell. You many choose new targets for the copy.

name: Stonebinder's Familiar
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Stonebinder's Familiar. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Hey, my great-great-grandfather had a dog just like that!"
—Dradiel, Lorehold mage-student

name: Tanazir Quandrix
oracle_text:
Flying, trample
When Tanazir Quandrix enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
Whenever Tanazir Quandrix attacks, you may have the base power and toughness of other creatures you control become equal to Tanazir Quandrix's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Multiple Choice
oracle_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

name: Multiple Choice
oracle_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft—Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed in this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

name: Igneous Inspiration
oracle_text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
flavor_text: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

name: Practical Research
oracle_text: Draw four cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an instant or sorcery card.
flavor_text: The twins each researched spells to defeat Extus in their own way. Will hit the library. Rowan hit everything else.

name: Prismari Campus
oracle_text:
Prismari Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: Mage-students who see spellcraft as the highest form of expression choose Prismari, the college of elemental arts.

name: Prismari Pledgemage
oracle_text:
Defender
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Prismari Pledgemage can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.
flavor_text: Many have the talent to create, but few have the courage to share their creations.

name: Spectacle Mage
oracle_text:
Flying
Instant and sorcery spells you cast with mana value 5 or greater cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: "It would be a crime to withhold my light from the world."

name: Rootha, Mercurial Artist
oracle_text: {2}, Return Rootha, Mercurial Artist to its owner's hand: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text: "Art is never finished. Merely abandoned."

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

name: Grinning Ignus
oracle_text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: "Sublime Rehearsal"
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, then put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile the rest. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

name: "Tiger Surfer"
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature leaves the battlefield, exile it instead" and "When this creature is exiled, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

name: "Elemental Calling"
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

name: Velomachus Lorehold
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottome of your library in a random order.

name: Thunderous Orator
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Thunderous Orator attacks, it gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, indestructible, lifelink, menace, and trample.

name: Thrilling Discovery
oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here."
_Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

name: Strict Proctor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability to trigger, counter that ability unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "You might believe that being dead for centuries has made me more lenient. I think you'll find the opposite is true."

name: Stonebound Mentor
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.

name: Spirit Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text:
"Books are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Sparring Regimen
oracle_text:
When Sparring Regimen enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature and untap it.
